We stayed around the corner from this brewery during our visit.  The hotel had 15 EUR breakfast which was very limited.  We had tapas here one night, and although OK, it is mostly potatoes, sausage, and great beer.  Kind of like Munich meets Barcelona.  Where this place really shines is breakfast.Came here two mornings.  Excellent bread, croissants and eggs.  Had the poached eggs with bacon and cheese on bread.  So good!  While you are here, definitely find an excuse to go downstairs and check out the space.  Part of the brewery and special function areas, very unique.
